title: Requirements: help-desk-whatsapp
five_acts: Act I - Account Setup: provision the Meta app, WhatsApp product, test recipient, and long-lived access token prerequisites.
Act II - TeleClaude Configuration: install WhatsApp credentials, optional known-customer identity mapping, and approved template settings in config.
Act III - Webhook Wiring: verify callback challenge flow and subscription setup so inbound WhatsApp events reach TeleClaude reliably.
Act IV - Functional Validation: walk through first-message routing, voice transcription, media handling, escalation relay, 24-hour template fallback, and identity resolution.
Act V - Teardown and Handover: clean test credentials/config and leave an operator checklist for repeatable production rollout.
